author: Hikari 93
title: Blaster Dark
text:
Line 21: |flavor = (BT04 R): Determination is the sword of darkness. Thunder forth, Blaster Dark!
(BT04 SP): No matter how many enemies I face, my determination will not waver! Thunder forth, Blaster Dark!
(PR/0105): The sword of determination with the strength to stand tall. Thunder forth, Blaster Dark!
(FC01):The black apparition appearing from the darkness !
(MB/043):The knight searches for power, the sword searched for determination. |flavor = (BT04 R): Determination is the sword of darkness. Thunder forth, Blaster Dark!
